DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single human being.:Pertaining to biology or to life and living things.:An independently existing thing (living or nonliving)._Of or relating to the system for delivering mail.:A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization._A foreign key to the place of residency for the person in the location table, where the detailed address information is stored.

ValueDomain.preferredName: OMOP CDM Person Residence Location Identifier
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A foreign key to the place of residency for the person in the location table, where the detailed address information is stored.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: all components of an address, including building number, street name and type, city, state, postal code, and country.
